Story

Shiro is a young boy who lives in a decaying world, completely in black and white.

After the fall of a meteor, several magical crystals arise and bring hope to mankind, because its essence carries the colors that can bring life back to this world.

Rumors suggest that Stokalis, the first wizard to find the crystals, is the only one in possession of a red colored crystal, while the rest of mankind has the blue ones.

Shiro travels to the wizard's tower to defeat Stokalis and acquire the second color that has the power to revitalize his world.
